Name: Unstable Rock
About the game: The stone predicting the weather is out of order, now it not only predicts, but also changes the weather by controlling the direction of the wind, collects the remnants of its tiny fragments in order to gather into a large boulder and roll off into the horizon! Unstable Rock is a 2d physical game about a stone with which you control the direction of the wind, from which everything around starts to blow away, however, in addition to various objects, the stone can break on some unfriendly objects, all that remains for you is to collect your fragments and drive off to the coveted goblet! - Beautiful Weather Effects - Pixel Art - Physical World - 3 Unique Worlds - Over 30 levels!
